name: SUNLU PLA 3D Printer Filament PLA Filament 1.75mm, Neatly Wound 3D Printing Filament 1.75mm, Dimensional Accuracy +/- 0.02 mm, Fit Most FDM 3D Printers, 1kg Spool (2.2lbs), Black
short_description: ①【SUNLU PLA 3D Printer Filament】PLA material is the perfect choice for 3D printing enthusiasts! SUNLU PLA filament is reliable, versatile, and easy to use. No clogs, bubbles, or tangles, its excellent layer adhesion ensures high-quality prints every time. Ideal for beginners and experienced users.

②【Neatly Wound 3D Filament Spool】SUNLU's self-developed neat winding device ensures that the filament is easy to use, with a 100% neat rate that reduces the risk of tangles and jams, and provides a smoother and more efficient 3D printing experience.

③【PLA Filament 1.75 mm】SUNLU 3D printer filament dimensional Accuracy +/- 0.02mm. SUNLU filament has wide compatibility due to the small diameter error, making it suitable for almost all 1.75mm FDM 3D printers.
④【Filament Spool Diameter】Spool Diameter: 8.00", Spool Width: 2.50", Spool Hub Hole Diameter: 2.20". The size of the SUNLU filament spool is suitable for hanging on a lot of FDM 3D printers.

⑤【PLA Recommend Settings】To achieve the best printing results with SUNLU PLA filament, we recommend printing at a nozzle temperature of 200-230°C, a bed temperature of 50-65°C, and a printing speed of 50-100mm/s.

⑥【SUNLU Main 3D Products】SUNLU offers a wide range of high-quality 3D printing products, including 3D printer filament, filament dryer, FDM 3D printer, 3D pen, 3D pen filament, 3D printer resin, LCD 3D printer, resin curing box, and other accessories, providing you with everything you need for a successful 3D printing experience.

name: PLA 3D Printer Filament 1.75mm,Candy Silk Rainbow,Multi Color,Net Weight 1kg(2.2lbs) Accuracy +/-0.05mm
short_description: Stronghero3D 1kg Silk Rainbow PLA Filament 1.75mm, Premium Multicolor Filament with High Gloss & Color Gradient Finish, net weight 1kg,330m Long, Vacuum Sealed.

● 🌈 Mesmerizing Silk & Rainbow Effect: Transform your 3D prints into works of art! This unique Multi Color Filament combines a silk-like sheen with a vibrant Rainbow Filament PLA color shift. Watch as the colors shift from orange to purple to pink as you print, creating stunning Gradient PLA visuals that hide layer lines. Perfect for eye-catching 3D Printer Filament PLA Multicolor projects.

● 📏 Ultra-Precise 1.75mm Tolerance: Featuring a strict diameter tolerance of ±0.02mm, this Filament 1.75 PLA ensures a consistent flow rate. It feeds smoothly through your extruder without clogging, jamming, or grinding. Ideal for anyone searching for high-quality Standard PLA Filament 1.75mm or general 3D Printer Filaments.

● 🛡️ Low Warping & Easy Bed Adhesion: Say goodbye to curled edges. Our enhanced formula provides excellent first-layer adhesion on glass, PEI, and build plates without the need for glues or hairspray. It remains flat and stable throughout the entire print, making it a reliable 3D printing filament option.

Vibrant, Consistent Color Transitions.Whether you’re using multicolor PLA filament, PLA rainbow filament, or iridescent 3D printer filament, Stronghero3D delivers seamless gradients and vivid shifts—no fading, no streaks.

To prevent filament tangling, make sure to secure the filament end either within the spool's designated hole or elsewhere after 3D printing. In case the filament end accidentally slips past during extrusion, rewind the filament to check for any potential tangles.

In order to reduce possible warping of the first layer, we recommend preheating the hot bed temperature to 55-65 degrees, reducing the printing speed of the first layer to 25mm/s, and setting the line width to 0.6mm or the flow rate to 150%, excessive fan cooling in cooler weather will worsen edge warping.

name: SUNLU PLA+2.0 Filament 1.75mm Black & White 2KG, High Speed PLA Plus Tougher and Stronger 3D Printer Filament Dimensional Accuracy +/- 0.02mm, 2 Pcs 1kg Spool(2.2lbs) Fits for Most FDM 3D Printers
short_description: 【Upgraded PLA+2.0 Filament】SUNLU PLA Plus 2.0 filament is a upgrade version to classic PLA+ filament 1.75mm, offering 12x higher toughness (vs.standard PLA) and optimized melt flow for high speed printing(50-600mm/s), delivering unparalleled speed-quality balance.

【High Speed Printing PLA Plus 2.0】Optimized for high speed 3D printers (e.g., Bambu Lab X1 series), delivering clog-free, low stringing prints at speeds up to 600mm/s. Saves your print time vs. standard PLA+ filament.

【Bambu-Compatible Spool Design】Designed for seamless compatibility with Bambu filament, our spool features a removable inner core for easy refill handling. No need to respool, just snap out the core and start printing.

【High Precision for smooth printing】Strict 1.75mm ±0.02mm filament diameter tolerance ensures smooth printing surfaces and dimensional accuracy. Advanced precision reduces warping even in large prints.

【Vacuum Sealed Ready-to-Print】SUNLU filament each spool is vacuum-sealed with a desiccant pack to prevent moisture absorption. The detachable spool core is compatible with Bambu filament refills for hassle free printing.
